mapper.select: select ta.dept_name,ta.media,ta.quarter,ifnull(sum(ta.quotas),0) quotas from yw_task ta group by ta.dept_name,ta.media,ta.quarter,ta.type having ta.type = '毛利' and ta.quarter = #{quarter}

select tb3.dept_name,tb3.media,tb3.quotas,tb2.summation from (select ta.dept_name,ta.media,ta.quarter,ifnull(sum(ta.quotas),0) quotas from yw_task ta group by ta.dept_name,ta.media,ta.quarter,ta.type having ta.type = '消耗' and ta.quarter = #{quarter}) tb3 left join (select tb1.dept_name,tb1.media,tb1.quarter,ifnull(sum(con.summation),0) summation from (select ta.sale_manager,ta.dept_name,ta.media,ta.quarter from yw_task ta where ta.type = '消耗' and ta.quarter = #{quarter}) tb1 left join yw_consumption con on tb1.sale_manager = con.sale_manager and tb1.media = con.media and tb1.quarter = con.quarter group by tb1.dept_name,tb1.media) tb2 on tb3.dept_name = tb2.dept_name and tb3.media = tb2.media

SELECT dept_name, quotasConsumption, quotasGrossMargin, totalSummation, totalGrossMargin, concat( round( totalSummation / quotasConsumption * 100, 2 ), '%' ) consumptionRate, concat( round( totalGrossMargin / quotasGrossMargin * 100, 2 ), '%' ) grossMarginRate FROM ( SELECT tb2.dept_name, IFNULL(tb1.quotasConsumption,0.00) quotasConsumption, IFNULL(tb2.quotasGrossMargin,0.00) quotasGrossMargin, IFNULL(tb5.totalSummation,0.00) totalSummation, IFNULL(tb6.totalGrossMargin,0.00) totalGrossMargin FROM (SELECT ta.dept_name, ta.type, IFNULL(sum( ta.quotas ),'0') quotasConsumption FROM yw_task ta GROUP BY ta.dept_name,ta.type,ta.quarter HAVING ta.type = '消耗' AND ta.quarter = #{quarter}) tb1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT ta.dept_name, ta.type, IFNULL(sum( ta.quotas ),'0') quotasGrossMargin FROM yw_task ta GROUP BY ta.dept_name,ta.type,ta.quarter HAVING ta.type = '毛利' AND ta.quarter = #{quarter}) tb2 ON tb1.dept_name = tb2.dept_name LEFT JOIN (select tb4.dept_name,IFNUll(sum(tb4.totalSummation),0.00) totalSummation from (select tb3.sale_manager,tb3.dept_name,IFNUll(sum(con.summation),0.00) totalSummation from yw_consumption con right join ( select sale_manager,quarter,dept_name from yw_task group by sale_manager,quarter,type having type = '消耗' AND quarter = #{quarter}) tb3 on con.sale_manager = tb3.sale_manager group by tb3.sale_manager) tb4 group by dept_name) tb5 on tb2.dept_name = tb5.dept_name LEFT JOIN (select tb4.dept_name,IFNUll(sum(tb4.totalGrossMargin),0.00) totalGrossMargin from (select tb3.sale_manager,tb3.dept_name,IFNUll(sum(con.gross_margin),0.00) totalGrossMargin from yw_gross_margins con right join ( select sale_manager,quarter,dept_name from yw_task group by sale_manager,quarter,type having type = '毛利' AND quarter = #{quarter}) tb3 on con.sales_manager = tb3.sale_manager group by tb3.sale_manager) tb4 group by dept_name) tb6 on tb2.dept_name = tb6.dept_name
UNION
SELECT tb2.dept_name, IFNULL(tb1.quotasConsumption,0.00) quotasConsumption, IFNULL(tb2.quotasGrossMargin,0.00) quotasGrossMargin, IFNULL(tb5.totalSummation,0.00) totalSummation, IFNULL(tb6.totalGrossMargin,0.00) totalGrossMargin FROM (SELECT ta.dept_name, ta.type, IFNULL(sum( ta.quotas ),'0') quotasConsumption FROM yw_task ta GROUP BY ta.dept_name,ta.type,ta.quarter HAVING ta.type = '消耗' AND ta.quarter = #{quarter}) tb1 RIGHT JOIN (SELECT ta.dept_name, ta.type, IFNULL(sum( ta.quotas ),'0') quotasGrossMargin FROM yw_task ta GROUP BY ta.dept_name,ta.type,ta.quarter HAVING ta.type = '毛利' AND ta.quarter = #{quarter}) tb2 ON tb1.dept_name = tb2.dept_name LEFT JOIN (select tb4.dept_name,IFNUll(sum(tb4.totalSummation),0.00) totalSummation from (select tb3.sale_manager,tb3.dept_name,IFNUll(sum(con.summation),0.00) totalSummation from yw_consumption con right join ( select sale_manager,quarter,dept_name from yw_task group by sale_manager,quarter,type having type = '消耗' AND quarter = #{quarter}) tb3 on con.sale_manager = tb3.sale_manager group by tb3.sale_manager) tb4 group by dept_name) tb5 on tb2.dept_name = tb5.dept_name LEFT JOIN (select tb4.dept_name,IFNUll(sum(tb4.totalGrossMargin),0.00) totalGrossMargin from (select tb3.sale_manager,tb3.dept_name,IFNUll(sum(con.gross_margin),0.00) totalGrossMargin from yw_gross_margins con right join ( select sale_manager,quarter,dept_name from yw_task group by sale_manager,quarter,type having type = '毛利' AND quarter = #{quarter}) tb3 on con.sales_manager = tb3.sale_manager group by tb3.sale_manager) tb4 group by dept_name) tb6 on tb2.dept_name = tb6.dept_name ) T

select rownum,sale_manager,ifnull(quotas,0.0) quotas,ifnull(gross_margin,0.0) gross_margin,concat(rate,'%') rate from ( select a.sale_manager,a.quotas,a.gross_margin,a.rate,@rownum := @rownum + 1 rownum from ( select tb1.sale_manager,tb1.quotas,tb2.gross_margin,round(tb2.gross_margin/tb1.quotas*100,2) rate from (select ta.quarter,ta.sale_manager,ifnull(sum(ta.quotas),'0') quotas from yw_task ta group by ta.sale_manager,ta.type,ta.quarter having ta.type = '毛利' AND ta.quarter = #{quarter}) tb1 left join (select gm.quarter,gm.sales_manager,sum(gm.gross_margin) gross_margin from yw_gross_margins gm group by gm.sales_manager,gm.quarter having gm.quarter = #{quarter}) tb2 on tb1.sale_manager = tb2.sales_manager and tb1.quarter = tb2.quarter order by rate desc ) a,(SELECT @rownum := 0) b) c

select rownum,sale_manager,ifnull(quotas,0.0) quotas,ifnull(summation,0.0) summation,concat(rate,'%') rate from ( select a.sale_manager,a.quotas,a.summation,a.rate,@rownum := @rownum + 1 rownum from ( select tb1.sale_manager,tb1.quotas,tb2.summation,round(tb2.summation/tb1.quotas*100,2) rate from (select ta.quarter,ta.sale_manager,ifnull(sum(ta.quotas),'0') quotas from yw_task ta group by ta.sale_manager,ta.type,ta.quarter having ta.type = '消耗' AND ta.quarter = #{quarter} ) tb1 left join (select con.quarter,con.sale_manager,sum(con.summation) summation from yw_consumption con group by con.sale_manager,con.quarter having con.quarter = #{quarter}) tb2 on tb1.sale_manager = tb2.sale_manager and tb1.quarter = tb2.quarter order by rate desc ) a,(SELECT @rownum := 0) b) c
